cockatrice_carddatabase.cards:
Latos Guard ATS W W 1 Creature - Human Knight 2/3 2 Defender (This creature can’t attack.) Latos Guard can’t block legendary creatures.
Imprendian Soldier ATS W 1W 2 Creature - Human Soldier 2/2 2 Battalion — Whenever Imprendian Soldier and at least two other creatures attack, Imprendian Soldier gains double strike until end of turn.
Imprendian Knight ATS W 1W 2 Creature - Human Knight 2/1 2 First strike Heroic — Whenever you cast a spell that targets Imprendian Knight, Imprendian Knight gets +0/+1 until end of turn.
Trained Warhawk ATS W 2W 3 Creature - Bird 1/2 2 Flying When Trained Warhawk enters the battlefield, create a 1/1 white Soldier creature token.
Devout Citizen ATS W W 1 Creature - Human Citizen 1/2 2 As long as no creatures have attacked this turn under your control, Devout Citizen has indestructible.
Capital Watcher ATS W 2WW 4 Creature - Human Soldier 3/5 2 Vigilance As long as you control three or more defending creatures, Capital Watcher has first strike.
Valor Example ATS W 1W 2 Creature - Human Cleric 1/3 2 When Valor Example enters the battlefield, you gain 1 life. Battalion — Whenever Valor Example and at least two other creatures attack, gain 1 life for each attacking nontoken creature you control.
Questing Cavalier ATS W 2W 3 Creature - Human Knight 2/2 2 Heroic — Whenever you cast a spell that targets Questing Cavalier, put a +1/+1 counter on Questing Cavalier.
Imprendian Priest ATS W 1W 2 Creature - Human Cleric 1/2 2 Lifelink Whenever an enchantment enters the battlefield under your control, you gain 1 life.
Devoted Healer ATS W 1WW 3 Creature - Human Cleric 2/3 2 When Devoted Healer enters the battlefield, you may return to your hand target creature card that was put into your graveyard this turn.
Enforce the Truce ATS W 2W 3 Instant 3 Destroy target attacking or blocking non-legendary creature.
City of God's Favor ATS W 1W 2 Enchantment - Aura 1 Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +1/+0 and has lifelink. Aura swap 1W (1W: Exchange this Aura with an Aura card in your hand.)
Ilcea's Blessing ATS W 1W 2 Enchantment - Aura 1 Enchant creature At the beginning of your turn, flip a coin. If you win the flip, enchanted creature gains indestructible until end of turn. Otherwise, it gets +0/+1 until end of turn. Aura swap 1W (1W: Exchange this Aura with an Aura card in your hand.)
Detain the Rebel ATS W WW 2 Instant 3 Tap target non-legendary creature. Avenge — Whenever a creature you control dies, if it is the first creature that died this turn, you may return Detain the Rebel from your graveyard to your hand.
Recurrent Favor ATS W 2W 3 Enchantment - Aura 1 Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 for each card named Recurrent Favor among the permanents you control and/or the cards in your graveyard. Aura swap 2W (2W: Exchange this Aura with an Aura card in your hand.)
Critical Intervention ATS W W 1 Sorcery 3 Target creature gets -1/+2 until end of turn. Then, target creature you don’t control gets +2/-1.
Royal Superiority ATS W 1W 2 Instant 3 As an additional cost to cast this spell, tap target untapped non-legendary creature you control. Choose one — • Destroy target enchantment. • Exile target enchantment attached to a creature.
Bold Defiance ATS W 1WW 3 Instant 3 Tap target legendary creature. Until end of turn, whenever that creature is dealt damage, exile it.
Ivortio's Intervention ATS W 4W 5 Sorcery 3 Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt this turn. Then, return each enchantment on the battlefield to its owner’s hand.
Sent Spirit ATS U U 1 Creature - Illusion 1/2 2 Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.) When Sent Spirit becomes the target of a spell or ability, sacrifice it.
Mystic Refuge Seeker ATS U 2U 3 Creature - Human Wizard 3/3 2 This spell can’t be countered. When Mystic Refuge Seeker becomes the target of a spell or ability, you may return it to its owner’s hand.
Arcane Arts Advisor ATS U 1U 2 Creature - Human Wizard 1/2 2 When Arcane Arts Advisor enters the battlefield, scry 1. Then, you may draw a card. If it’s an Aura card, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control.
Imprendian Wizard ATS U 2U 3 Creature - Human Wizard 2/3 2 Imprendian Wizard can’t be blocked. Heroic — Whenever you cast a spell that targets Imprendian Wizard, Imprendian Wizard gains hexproof until end of turn.
Relic Hunter ATS U 1U 2 Creature - Human Wizard 1/2 2 When Relic Hunter enters the battlefield, you may gain control of target artifact or enchantment until Relic Hunter leaves the battlefield.
Aural Cleanser ATS U 1UU 3 Creature - Human Shaman 1/3 2 Defender 2U, T: Attach target Aura to target creature. If you did, scry 1.
Divine Impostor ATS U 2U 3 Creature - Shapeshifter Demigod 2/2 2 You may have Divine Impostor enter the battlefield as a copy of any creature on the battlefield, except it is a Demigod in addition to its other types and it has hexproof.
Channeler of the Gods ATS U 1U 2 Creature - Human Cleric 2/2 2 Whenever an enchantment enters the battlefield under your control, you may search your library for an instant or sorcery card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. If you did, shuffle your library.
Silver Sea Captain ATS U 1UU 3 Creature - Human Pirate 2/3 2 Heroic — Whenever you cast a spell that targets Silver Sea Captain, target legendary creature you control gets +0/+1 until end of turn. U, T: Target Pirate gets +0/+2 until end of turn. Untap it.
Silver Sea Looter ATS U 1U 2 Creature - Human Pirate 2/2 2 A deck can have any number of cards named Silver Sea Looter. When Silver Sea Looter enters the battlefield or dies, draw a card, then discard a card.
Inferior Denial ATS U 2U 3 Instant 3 Counter target spell with converted mana cost 3 or less. If it was an Aura spell, scry 1. (To scry 1, look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.)
Weaken the Weak ATS U 3U 4 Instant 3 Up to two target non-legendary creatures get -2/-1 each until end of turn.
Godly Chains ATS U 3U 4 Enchantment - Aura 1 Enchant creature Enchanted creature can’t attack or block and has -3/-3. Aura swap U (U: Exchange this Aura with an Aura card in your hand.)
Hartheus' Meddling ATS U 1U 2 Sorcery 3 You may exchange target Aura you control with another target Aura you control. Then, you may move up to one counter from target creature to another target creature.
Zaeva's Blessing ATS U 1U 2 Enchantment - Aura 1 Enchant creature Whenever enchanted creature deals damage to a player, scry 1. Aura swap 1U (1U: Exchange this Aura with an Aura card in your hand.)
Strength from Above ATS U 1U 2 Enchantment - Aura 1 Enchant creature Enchanted creature has +2/+2 Aura swap 2U (2U: Exchange this Aura with an Aura card in your hand.)
Unfair Intervention ATS U XU 1 Sorcery 3 As an additional cost to cast this spell, exile three creature cards from your graveyard. Target player mills X cards.
Awaken the Relics ATS U 1UU 3 Instant 3 As an additional cost to cast this spell, tap an untapped artifact you control. Draw a card for each artifact and/or enchantment you control. Then, each opponent draws one card.
Mortal Abandonment ATS U 1U 2 Enchantment 1 At the beginning of each turn, each player discards an enchantment card or exiles an enchantment card from their graveyard. If a player is not able to do so, they mill half of the cards in their library, rounded up.
Perlabian Savage ATS B 1B 2 Creature - Human Warrior 1/2 2 Lifelink B, Exile a creature card from your graveyard: Perlabian Savage gains +2/+0 until end of turn.
Barbaric Intimidator ATS B 1B 2 Creature - Human Warrior 3/1 2 Menace Barbaric Intimidator attacks each turn if able.
Impure Warlord ATS B 2BB 4 Creature - Human Soldier 2/3 2 When Impure Warlord enters the battlefield, you lose 3 life. Domain — Impure Warlord has +2/+0 for each basic land type among lands you control.
Cursed Soldier ATS B B 1 Creature - Human Soldier 1/1 2 Deathtouch When Cursed Soldier enters the battlefield, you may return target Aura you don’t control to its owner’s hand.
Perlabian Warleader ATS B 1B 2 Creature - Human Cleric 2/1 2 Avenge — Whenever a creature you control dies, if it is the first creature that died this turn, target creature you control gains lifelink until end of turn.
Undead Infiltrator ATS B B 1 Creature - Zombie Soldier 2/2 2 As an additional cost to cast this spell, exile a creature card from your graveyard. Target opponent creates a token that’s a copy of it, except it has base power and toughness of 1/1 and is a Zombie in addition to its other types. Menace, lifelink
Relentless Attacker ATS B 1BB 3 Creature - Human Soldier 5/5 2 Relentless Attacker can’t block. Whenever Relentless Attacker becomes tapped, put a -1/-1 counter on it.
Flesh-Eating Rider ATS B 1B 2 Creature - Zombie Knight 1/3 2 Lifelink As long as there are eight or more creatures in any one graveyard, Flesh-Eating Rider has deathtouch.
Horror of the Dark Kingdom ATS B 3B 4 Creature - Vampire Warrior 3/4 2 Lifelink, flying When Horror of the Dark Kingdom enters the battlefield, destroy up to one target creature you control. If you did, you gain life equal to that creature’s converted mana cost.
Dark Army Remnant ATS B BB 2 Creature - Human Soldier 1/2 2 Deathtouch Avenge — Whenever a creature you control dies, if it is the first creature that died this turn, target player discards a creature card.
Thirst for Betrayal ATS B 2B 3 Enchantment - Aura 1 Enchant creature Whenever enchanted creature attacks, it deals 1 damage to itself and 2 damage to target creature its controller controls. Aura swap B (B: Exchange this Aura with an Aura card in your hand.)
Army Consumption ATS B 1B 2 Instant 3 Discard your hand. You gain life equal to the number of cards discarded this way plus 2.
From Towers to Hearts ATS B 1B 2 Enchantment 1 Domain — At the beginning of you combat step, From Towers to Hearts deals 1 damage to target creature for each basic land type among lands you control.
Banned from the City ATS B 3B 4 Enchantment - Aura 1 Enchant creature Whenever a creature damaged by enchanted creature dies, its controller discards a card. Then, put a +1/+1 counter on enchanted creature.
Hipocelous' Blessing ATS B 1B 2 Enchantment - Aura 1 Enchant creature Enchanted creature has deathtouch. If a creature damaged by enchanted creature would go to a graveyard, exile it instead. Aura swap 1B (1B: Exchange this Aura with an Aura card in your hand.)
Legend Rising ATS B 1BB 3 Sorcery 3 Exile a legendary creature card from your graveyard. Then, create token that’s a copy of it, except it’s a Zombie in addition to its other types. At the end of this turn, exile that token.
Break the Truce ATS B 1B 2 Sorcery 3 Destroy target non-legendary creature. You lose 4 life.
Hipocelous' Departure ATS B 1BB 3 Sorcery 3 Put a -1/-1 counter on each creature on the battlefield. Until end of turn, each player may play up to one card from their graveyard.
Underworld Buyback ATS B 1B 2 Sorcery 3 As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature with converted mana cost 2 or greater. Return target non-legendary creature from your graveyard to your hand.

Capital Strong Arm ATS R R 1 Creature - Human Soldier 1/1 2 Haste Avenge — Whenever a creature you control dies, if it is the first creature that died this turn, untap Capital Strong Arm.
Animonte's Supporter ATS R 1R 2 Creature - Human Rebel 2/2 2 First strike Battalion — Whenever Animonte’s Supporter and at least two other creatures attack, it deals 1 damage to target creature or player.
Attack Leader ATS R 1RR 3 Creature - Human Soldier 3/3 2 When Attack Leader enters the battlefield, exile the top card of your library. Until end of turn, you may play that card. Avenge — Whenever a creature you control dies, if it is the first creature that died this turn, creatures you control get +0/+1 until end of turn.
Animonte's Adjutant ATS R 2R 3 Creature - Human Soldier 2/2 2 First strike (This creature deals combat damage before creatures without first strike.) As long as you control one or more legendary creatures and/or Knights, Animonte’s Adjutant has menace.
Spontaneous Renegade ATS R RR 2 Creature - Human Rebel 3/1 2 When Spontaneous Renegade enters the battlefield, discard a card, then draw a card. Spontaneous Renegade attacks each turn if able.
Catapult Operator ATS R 1R 2 Creature - Human Soldier 2/2 2 1R: Catapult Operator gets +1/+0 until end of turn. R, T, Tap an artifact you control: Deal damage to target creature or player equal to Catapult Operator’s power.
Victorious Champion ATS R 3R 4 Creature - Human Warrior 4/3 2 Haste Heroic — Whenever you cast a spell that targets Victorious Champion, Victorious Champion gets +0/+1 and gains menace until end of turn.
Tavern Brawler ATS R R 1 Creature - Human Warrior 1/1 2 Battalion — Whenever Tavern Brawler and at least two other creatures attack, you may tap target artifact or nonbasic land.
Traitorous Aristocrat ATS R 1R 2 Creature - Human Noble 1/3 2 Domain — Whenever a legendary creature enters the battlefield, choose a creature for each basic land type among lands you control. Chosen creatures gain haste until end of turn.
Gloryborn Cohort ATS R 2R 3 Creature - Human Knight 2/3 2 Defender, double strike As long as you control a God or Demigod, Gloryborn Cohort can attack as though it didn’t have defender.
Divine Recruitment ATS R 3R 4 Sorcery 3 Choose one — • Gain control of target non-legendary creature until end of turn. Untap that creature. • Gain control of target legendary creature. Divine Recruitment deals 2 damage to you.
Conquer ATS R 1R 2 Instant 3 Domain — Tap a land you don’t control for each basic land type among lands you control. Lands tapped this way don’t untap during their controller’s next untap step unless they pay 1 for each of the ones they untap.
Flaming Storm ATS R 1R 2 Sorcery 3 Deal 1 damage to target creature. Repeat this process for each creature you control with power 2 or greater. You may choose new targets each time.
Cursed Fury ATS R 4R 5 Enchantment - Aura 1 Enchant creature At the beginning of its controller’s turn, enchanted creature fights another creature its controller controls of that player’s choice. (Each deals damage equal to its power to the other.)
Fostos' Blessing ATS R 1R 2 Enchantment - Aura 1 Enchant creature Enchanted creature has double strike, haste and attacks each turn if able. Aura swap 1R (1R: Exchange this Aura with an Aura card in your hand.)
Fostos' Intervention ATS R R 1 Sorcery 3 Target non-legendary creature gains double strike until end of turn.
Profits of War ATS R RR 2 Enchantment 1 Whenever three or more creatures attack, you may discard a card. If you do, draw a card. At the end of each turn, if no creatures attacked this turn, put a peace counter on Profits of War. Otherwise, remove a peace counter from it. Then if there are two or more peace counters on it, sacrifice it.
Prepare for War ATS R R 1 Instant 3 Target non-legendary creature gains haste until end of turn. Scry 1.
Perlabian Ambusher ATS G 1G 2 Creature - Human Warrior 2/3 2 When Perlabian Ambusher enters the battlefield, if you control three or more Forests, it gets +2/+1 until end of turn.

Bribed Surveyor ATS G 1G 2 Creature - Human Advisor 2/2 2 T, Discard a card: Look at the top card of your library. If it’s a land, put it onto the battlefield tapped.
Imprendian Bear ATS G 2GG 4 Creature - Bear 4/5 2 Trample Domain — When Imprendian Bear enters the battlefield, you may return up to one card named Imprendian Bear from your graveyard to your hand for each basic land type among lands you control.
Imprendian Woodward ATS G 2G 3 Creature - Elf Archer 2/3 2 Vigilance When Imprendian Woodward enters the battlefield, if you control four or more Forests, add G to your mana pool.
Spirit of the Waterfall ATS UG 1G/U 2 Creature - Spirit 2/2 2 When Spirit of the Waterfall enters the battlefield, you may return target land card from your graveyard to your hand. GG: Add one mana of any color. U, T: Scry 1.
Haunted Forest Root-Eater ATS G 4G 5 Creature - Beast 4/4 2 Trample (This creature can deal excess combat damage to the player or planeswalker it’s attacking.) Domain — Haunted Forest Root-Eater gets +1/+1 for each basic land type among lands you control.
Gigantic Siegefang ATS G 4GG 6 Creature - Beast 3/4 2 As long as you control four or more basic Forests, Gigantic Siegefang costs 4 less to cast. When Gigantic Siegefang enters the battlefield, search your library for a basic Forest card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library.
Latos Garden Mole ATS G G 1 Creature - Mole 1/1 2 Latos Garden Mole can’t be blocked by creatures with power 4 or greater. G, T: Latos Garden Mole gains hexproof until end of turn
Perlabian Blessing Killer ATS G 2G 3 Creature - Human Druid 3/4 2 When Perlabian Blessing Killer enters the battlefield, destroy target artifact or Aura.
Siblo's Blessing ATS G 1G 2 Enchantment - Aura 1 Enchant creature When Siblo’s Blessing enters the battlefield, choose a creature you don’t control. Enchanted creature can only be blocked by the chosen creature. Aura swap 1G (1G: Exchange this Aura with an Aura card in your hand.)
Natural Nomination ATS G GG 2 Instant 3 When Natural Nomination enters the battlefield, choose a legendary creature. Choose one or more — • Chosen creature must be blocked this turn if able. • Until end of turn, chosen creature can’t be blocked by creatures with power 2 or less. • Until end of turn, chosen creature can block any number of creatures.
Song of the Elves ATS G 1GG 3 Enchantment 1 At the beginning of your upkeep, you may tap all creatures you control. If you do, add C for each creature tapped this way and an additional G for each God tapped this way.
Blessing on the Land ATS G 2GG 4 Enchantment 1 Creatures you control with base power 4 or greater enter the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on them.
Achievements of War ATS G 3G 4 Sorcery 3 Gain control or two target lands. Then, your opponent gains control of two target lands you control. Then, tap all lands.
Nature's Strength ATS G 2G 3 Enchantment - Aura 1 Enchant creature Enchanted creature has +2/-1. You may have enchanted creature assign its combat damage as though it weren’t blocked.
Last Push of Life ATS G 2GG 4 Sorcery 3 Tap all lands you control. Until end of turn, lands enter the battlefield tapped. You may play up to three additional lands this turn.
Fierce Instinct ATS G 2G 3 Instant 3 Target creature gets +2/+2 and gains trample until end of turn.
Peasant's Respect ATS G 3G 4 Enchantment 1 At the beginning of your turn, add G to your mana pool.

City's Scrutiny ATS W WW 2 Enchantment - Aura 1 Enchant creature Heroic — Whenever you cast a spell that targets enchanted creature, you may cast an enchantment card from your hand without paying its mana cost. If you do, destroy City’s Scrutiny.
Title of King ATS W 1W 2 Sorcery 3 Domain — Gain 1 life for each basic land type among lands you control. Your opponents can’t cast spells this turn. (Spells cast before this resolves are unaffected.)

Vengeance ATS R R 1 Enchantment - Aura 1 Enchant creature Enchanted creature has +2/+0 and haste. At the end of your turn, if no creatures died under your control this turn, sacrifice Vengeance. Otherwise, you may attach it to target creature you control.

Impious Refusal ATS R 3R 4 Sorcery 3 Destroy all Auras attached to target creature. Target opponent may then choose to exile the top X cards of their library, where X is the number of Auras destroyed this way. Until end of turn, cards exiled this way may be played by their owner.
Madness from Above ATS R XRR 2 Sorcery 3 Target creature deals damage equal to its power to another target creature. Repeat this process X plus 2 times, alternating between you and target opponent choosing the targets, starting with you choosing them.
Arrow Rain ATS R 1RR 3 Instant 3 Deal damage to target player or planeswalker equal to the number of attacking creatures you control.

Then shuffle your library.
Territorial Inhabitant ATS G 3G 4 Creature - Beast 3/3 2 Domain — When Territorial Inhabitant enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on it for each basic land type among lands you control. GGGGG, T: For each +1/+1 counter on Territorial Inhabitant, put an additional one on it.

Ancient Giant ATS G 4GG 6 Creature - Giant 5/6 2 During you first main phase, instead of paying Ancient Giant’s mana cost, you may tap three untapped legendary creatures you control. GG, T: Destroy target artifact or enchantment.

Come to Earth ATS G 2GG 4 Sorcery 3 Search your library and/or graveyard for a God or Demigod card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library.
